    • Method Detail

      • contains

        public java.lang.Boolean contains(java.awt.Point p)
        Returns True if Point is on Obstacle. Else, returns False. Tests if point C is on straight line AB. Uses triangle inequality. If AC + CB = AB, then C is on AB.

      • isNearPoint

        public java.lang.Boolean isNearPoint(java.awt.Point p)
        Returns True if Point is near Obstacle. Else, returns False. This function is used to click more easily on Obstacle in DrawingPanel. If right click event was checked with contains() method, then the user would have to click perfectly on Obstacle, and it can be difficult to do so.
